About Futu Securities
Futu Securities is a reputable online brokerage firm based in China, providing a range of online trading services to individual investors, empowering them to access global financial markets and manage their investments efficiently. Futu is a registered broker by SFC（CE No. AZT137）and licensed with SFC types 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7 and 9 licenses. It is also a member of HKEX and SGX and it partners with AMEX, NYSE, NASDAQ.

One of the key advantages of using Futu Securities is the ability to access multiple global markets. The platform provides access to stock exchanges in the United States, Hong Kong, Mainland China, etc, allowing investors to diversify their portfolios and take advantage of investment opportunities in different markets.

Also, Futu Securities offers a wide range of investment products, including stocks, options, exchange-traded funds (ETFs), mutual funds, and fixed income securities, providing investors with the flexibility to choose from various asset classes and tailor their investment strategies accordingly.
Key Features of Futu Securities
Futu's investing platform, Futubull, goes beyond just providing trading services, which offers a comprehensive suite of features and tools to assist customers in their investing journey and help them develop their trading knowledge and skills.
Real-time market Data
Futubull provides real-time market data from the major stock markets it covers, including Hong Kong, Mainland China, and the United States. Customers can access live quotes, charts, and in-depth financial information for informed decision-making.
Various investment products available for trading
Futubull enables customers to trade stocks, options, and other financial instruments in the supported markets. The platform offers a user-friendly interface for placing trades, monitoring portfolios, and managing orders. It also provides advanced order types, such as limit orders and stop-loss orders, to cater to different trading strategies.
Newsfeed function
Staying updated with the latest market news and developments is crucial for successful investing. Futubull features a news feed that delivers timely and relevant information from reputable sources. Customers can access breaking news, company announcements, market analysis, and other relevant insights to make well-informed investment decisions.
Community and Social Features
Futu understands the importance of learning from and connecting with fellow investors. The platform includes a vibrant community where users can share ideas, strategies, and insights. Customers can participate in discussions, follow influential traders, and learn from experienced investors. This social aspect of the platform fosters a collaborative environment where users can enhance their trading knowledge and skills.
Educational Resources
Futubull also provides educational resources to help users improve their understanding of investing and trading. These resources may include tutorials, articles, videos, and webinars covering various topics such as fundamental and technical analysis, risk management, and investment strategies. By offering educational materials, Futu aims to empower its customers to make informed investment decisions and grow their expertise.
Overall, Futu and its investing platform, Futubull, strive to offer a comprehensive and user-friendly experience for customers seeking online investing services. It combines advanced trading capabilities with market data, news feeds, community engagement, and educational resources to create a holistic environment for investors to thrive.
How to Open a Futu Securities account?
Section Blurb
Step 1
Visit the Futu Securities website
Go to the official website of Futu Securities.
Step 2
Create an account
Look for the "Sign Up" or button on the website and click on it.
Step 3
Provide personal information
Fill out the registration form with your personal details, including your full name, contact information, date of birth, and nationality.
Step 4
Complete the application form
Once you have provided your personal information, you will need to complete the application form. This form typically asks for additional details like your employment status, financial information, investment experience, and risk tolerance. Fill in all the required fields accurately.
Step 5
Verification process
Futu Securities may ask for supporting documents, such as proof of address and identification, to complete the verification process. Follow the instructions provided by Futu Securities to submit the necessary documents securely.
Step 6
Funding your account
After your account is approved and verified, you will need to deposit funds into your Futu Securities account to start trading. Futu Securities offers various funding options, such as bank transfers, wire transfers, and online payment methods. Follow the instructions on the platform to deposit funds into your account.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
What is Futu Securities?
Futu Securities is an online brokerage firm that provides trading and investment services to individuals. It offers a platform that allows users to trade stocks, options, futures, and other financial instruments. Futu Securities operates in multiple jurisdictions, including Hong Kong, the United States, etc.
Is my money protected when investing in Futu Securities?
FSCS can cover your financial loss if a licensed firm such as Futu Securities closes down.
Who is eligible to apply for Futu Securities?
Hong Kong residents aged 18 or above are eligible to apply.
